text: Moutier is a town of the administrative district of Jura bernois in the canton of Bern in Switzerland. There were two votes, whether they wanted to be with Bern or Jura. In the last one, a majority voted for Jura. From 2026, the town will become part of Jura. ==References== ==Other websites== * Moutier Official website * Tornos Official website * Schaublin Official website Category:Cities in Switzerland Category:Municipalities in Jura bernois
title: Moutier
